title: Log In Client Crash Loop
body: The log in client bug splats almost immediately on launch, followed by it relaunching itself, bug splatting again, and looping. This opens up infinite bug splat pages,

replies.body: As LostFrost mentioned, this is likely being caused by Discord Overlay. Disable that and let me know if there's still an issue!

Do you have Discord open?
The new Discord overlay is causing a problem with very similar symptoms.
i'm having the same problem atm
